advancement.create_connected.sequenced_p: Place down a Sequenced Pulse Generator
block.create_connected.brake.tooltip.sum: A device that produces _immense stress_ when powered, halting the network by _overstressing_ it.
block.create_connected.brass_gearbox.too: A gearbox where the rotation direction of all 4 sides are _independently configurable_.
block.create_connected.centrifugal_clutc: A clutch that is only _coupled_ if the input RPM is _faster_ than a configurable threshold.
block.create_connected.copycat_beam.tool: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative beam.
block.create_connected.copycat_block.too: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative clone.
block.create_connected.copycat_board.too: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative board. Multiple boards can be placed in the same block space.
block.create_connected.copycat_fence.too: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative fence.
block.create_connected.copycat_fence_gat: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a functional fence gate.
block.create_connected.copycat_slab.tool: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative slab. Can be placed _vertically_.
block.create_connected.copycat_stairs.to: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into decorative stairs. Note: buggy connected textures.
block.create_connected.copycat_vertical_: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative vertical step.
block.create_connected.copycat_wall.tool: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
_Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative wall.
block.create_connected.fan_blasting_cata: Dedicated _bulk blasting_ device. Content of the catalyst does not interact with the environment.
block.create_connected.fan_freezing_cata: Dedicated _bulk freezing_ device for compatible mods. Content of the catalyst does not interact with the environment.
block.create_connected.fan_haunting_cata: Dedicated _bulk haunting_ device. Content of the catalyst does not interact with the environment.
block.create_connected.fan_sanding_catal: Dedicated _bulk sanding_ device for Create: Dreams and Desires. Content of the catalyst does not interact with the environment.
block.create_connected.fan_seething_cata: Dedicated _bulk superheating_ device for Create: Dreams and Desires. Content of the catalyst does not interact with the environment.
block.create_connected.fan_smoking_catal: Dedicated _bulk smoking_ device. Content of the catalyst does not interact with the environment.
block.create_connected.fan_splashing_cat: Dedicated _bulk washing_ device. Content of the catalyst does not interact with the environment.
block.create_connected.fluid_vessel.tool: A _horizontal_ fluid tank. Less efficient when used as a boiler.
A clutch that is only _coupled_ if the input spins in the _correct direction_ as configured.
block.create_connected.overstress_clutch: A clutch that _uncouples_ after a set delay when the network is _overstressed_.
block.create_connected.shear_pin.tooltip: A single-use connector that _breaks_ when the network is _overstressed_.
block.create_connected.six_way_gearbox.t: A gearbox with shafts on _all 6 sides_. Top and bottom spin at _half speed_.
create.item_attributes.id_contains.inver: does not have the word "%1$s" in ID
create_connected.gui.overstress_clutch.u: This clutch is _uncoupled_ due to stress. Fix the network before _resetting_ this clutch with a _wrench_ or a _redstone pulse_.
create_connected.ponder.chain_cogwheel_r: Relaying rotational force with Chain Cogwheels
Chain Cogwheels are Chain Drives with an extra cogwheel
They connect to other chained components in a row
All shafts connected like this will rotate in the same direction
Cogwheels can connect to Chain Cogwheels anywhere in the row
Any part of the row can be rotated by 90 degrees
create_connected.ponder.crank_wheel.head: Generating Rotational Force using Crank Wheels
create_connected.ponder.crank_wheel.text: Crank Wheels can be used by players to apply rotational force manually
Hold Right-Click to rotate it Counter-Clockwise
Sneak and Hold Right-Click to rotate it Clockwise
create_connected.ponder.inventory_access: Connecting to inventories with Inventory Access Port
Accessing inventory can be challenging in tight spaces
Inventory Access Ports extend inventories to help with that
Multiple ports can be attached to one inventory
Ports do not provide additional storage space
But components attached to ports can access inventories...
But they can be disabled with redstone
create_connected.ponder.inventory_bridge: Connecting two inventories with Inventory Bridge
Inventory Bridge provides an interface to access two inventories simultaneously
It does not provide additional storage space
Only components attached to the bridge itself can access both inventories
Multiple bridges can be attached to the same set of inventories
Use a redstone signal to disable the bridge
Filter slots on the Inventory Bridge specify which inventory the inserted items should go to
Items that do not match either filter cannot be inserted into the bridge
Non-empty filters take precedence over empty ones...
...and prevent matching items from going to the unfiltered side
Filters are ignored when extracting items from inventories
Controlling rotational force using an Inverted Clutch
Inverted Clutches will not relay rotation...
create_connected.ponder.inverted_gearshi: Controlling rotational force using an Inverted Gearshift
Inverted Gearshifts will reverse rotation in a straight line
When powered by Redstone, it relays rotation with its direction unchanged
create_connected.ponder.linked_transmitt: Right-click a redstone input with a Linked Transmitter to attach it to the input
Linked Transmitters can transmit input signals wirelessly
Receivers emit the redstone power of transmitters within 128 blocks
Placing items in the two slots can specify a Frequency
Only the links with matching Frequencies will communicate
...right-click the transmitter while sneaking to lock the frequency slots
Linked Transmitters also work on buttons and analog levers
Right-click the transmitter with a wrench to detach it from the input
create_connected.ponder.parallel_gearbox: Relaying rotational force using Parallel Gearboxes
This setup is simple but currently impossible
A parallel gearbox encapsulates this into a block
Shafts around corners rotate in the same direction
create_connected.ponder.sequenced_pulse_: Controlling signals using Sequenced Pulse Generators
Seq. Pulse Gen. outputs signals by following a timed list of instructions
Right-click it to open the Configuration UI
Upon receiving a signal from its back...
...it will start running its configured sequence
Once finished, it waits for the next signal and starts over
A redstone comparator can be used to read the current progress
Upon receiving a signal from its sides...
...it will reset and terminate the sequence immediately
